WorkItem.Description:
I have this exception:
 
Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Syntax error: +, lookahead: D, current char: 1' in C:\xampp\htdocs\dotproject\lib\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel5\Parser.php:1406 Stack trace: #0 C:\xampp\htdocs\dotproject\lib\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel5\Parser.php(1312): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5_Parser->_fact() #1 C:\xampp\htdocs\dotproject\lib\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel5\Parser.php(1272): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5_Parser->_term() #2 C:\xampp\htdocs\dotproject\lib\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel5\Parser.php(1220): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5_Parser->_expression() #3 C:\xampp\htdocs\dotproject\lib\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel5\Parser.php(1207): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5_Parser->_condition() #4 C:\xampp\htdocs\dotproject\lib\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel5\Worksheet.php(934): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5_Parser->parse('+D6-D29') #5 C:\xampp\htdocs\dotproject\lib\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel5\Worksheet.php(477): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5_Worksheet->_writeFormula(29, 3, '=+D6-D29', 99) #6 C:\xampp\htdocs\dotproject\lib\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel5\Workbook.php(497): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5_Worksh in C:\xampp\htdocs\dotproject\lib\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel5\Parser.php on line 1406
 
and when I change '+D6-D29' to 'D6-D29', the writer success write the file. excel 2007 do not have this exception.
WorkItem.Summary: excel 5 writer have error with cell's fomula as '+D6-D29'

Comments.Message:
The problem is with the unary plus operator. Check this work item:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=7895
